description:
Desperate to learn Fuyuki`s Tanabata wish, Momoka tries to steal all of the paper strips to read it.  But Keroro`s already stolen them, for research into the invasion!  And then the Keroro Platoon tries to radiojack 623`s show, faking Sumomo as a guest star again.  Giroro`s horrified when they make him play the role all over again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro - Wishes on Tanabata / Keroro - Revival! The Extraordinarily Talented Dopamine
ケロロ 七夕に願いを! / ケロロ 復活! 怪傑ドーパミン
